DOC.brief_summary: To assess drug drug interaction pharmacokinetics investigation steady state Telmisartan , Amlodipine , Hydrochlorothiazide ( HCTZ ) give three different formulation healthy Japanese male subject
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Different Formulations Telmisartan , Amlodipine , Hydrochlorothiazide ( HCTZ ) Japanese Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy Japanese male subject age > =20 < =35 year ; body weight : > =50 kg < =80 kg ; body mass index : > =18.0 < =25.0 kg/m2 Without clinically significant finding complication basis complete medical history , include physical examination , vital sign ( blood pressure ( BP ) , pulse rate ( PR ) , body temperature ) , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECGs ) , clinical laboratory test Signed date write informed consent prior admission trial accordance Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) local legislation . Exclusion criterion : Any find medical examination ( include BP , PR ECGs ) deviate normal clinical relevance .
